sections.text: gaming tax.To the full extent permitted by the Constitution of Nebraska, including amendments to the Constitution of Nebraska adopted contemporaneously with the enactment of sections 9-1201 to 9-1208, an annual gaming tax is hereby imposed on the operation of all games of chance by authorized gaming operators within licensed racetrack enclosures.SourceInitiative Law 2020, No. 431, ยง 1.

9-1201.Annual gaming tax.

To the full extent permitted by the Constitution of Nebraska, including amendments to the Constitution of Nebraska adopted contemporaneously with the enactment of sections 9-1201 to 9-1208, an annual gaming tax is hereby imposed on the operation of all games of chance by authorized gaming operators within licensed racetrack enclosures.

SourceInitiative Law 2020, No. 431, ยง 1.
